#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<list>

using namespace std;

void quick_sort(vector<long> &a,int left,int right)
{
    int i = left, j = right;
    int tmp;
    int pivot = a[(left + right) / 2];
    while (i <= j)
    {
        while (a[i] < pivot)    i++;
            while (a[j] > pivot)    j--;

            if (i <= j)
            {
                tmp = a[i];
                a[i] = a[j];
                a[j] = tmp;
                i++;
                j--;
            }

    }

    if (left < j)   quick_sort(a, left, j);
    if (i < right)  quick_sort(a, i, right);
}

int pos_search(vector<long> &a,long x,int l,int r)      //a sorted
{
    int s=a.size()-1;
    if(l==r) return l;
    else if(a[(l+r)/2]<x) pos_search(a,x,(l+r)/2 + 1,r);
    else pos_search(a,x,l,(l+r)/2);
}

int main()
{
    vector<long> v;
    int t,n,i,f;
    long a,g;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t>0)
    {
        v.clear();
        scanf("%d",&n);
        v.push_back(0);
        i=1;
        while(i<=n)
        {
            scanf("%ld",&a);
            v.push_back(a);
            i++;
        }
        scanf("%d",&f);
        g=v[f];
        quick_sort(v,0,n);
        printf("%d\n",pos_search(v,g,0,n));
        t--;
    }
}
